description: This Dart source file defines the AppState class, which manages application-wide state related to dashboard statistics in a Flutter app. It interacts with a DataRepository to fetch and update counts of students, staff, messages, and notifications, and provides methods to refresh the overview and add new students or staff.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: Manages app-wide state, including counts of students, staff, messages, and notifications, and interacts with the data repository to keep the dashboard data current.

methods.name: refreshOverview
methods.description: Fetches latest data for students, staff, messages, and notifications from the repository, updates internal counters, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: addStudent
methods.description: Adds a new student via the repository, then refreshes the dashboard stats.

methods.name: addStaff
methods.description: Adds a new staff member via the repository, then refreshes the dashboard stats.
